subject: From Mr David Moyes
body:
From Mr David Moyes
Head Officer-in-Charge
Administrative Service Inspection Unit
P.O. Box 20509 Atlanta, GA 30320
GOOD DAY
I am Mr David Moyes, Head Officer-in-Charge, Administrative Service Inspection Unit United Nations Inspection Agency in Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport Atlanta, Georgia. During our investigation, I discovered an abandoned shipment through a Diplomat from United Kingdom which was transferred from JF Kennedy Airport to our facility here in Atlanta, and when scanned it revealed an undisclosed sum of money in 2 Metal Trunk Boxes weighing approximately 110kg each.
The consignment was abandoned because the Content was not properly declared by the consignee as money rather it was declared as personal effect/classified document to either avoid diversion by the Shipping Agent or confiscation by the relevant authorities. The diplomat's inability to pay for Non Inspection fees among other things are the reason why the consignment is delayed and abandoned.
By my assessment, each of the boxes contains about $4M or more. They are still left in the airport storage facility till today. The Consignments like I said are two metal trunk boxes weighing about 65kg each (Internal dimension: W61 x H156 x D73 (cm) effective capacity: 680 L) Approximately. The details of the consignment including your name and email on the official document from United Nations' office in London where the shipment was tagged as personal effects/classified document is still available with us. As it stands now, you have to reconfirm your full name, Phone Number, full address so I can cross-check and see if it corresponds with the one on the official documents. It is now left to you to decide if you still need the consignment or allow us repatriate it back to UK (place of origin) as we were instructed.(REPLY TO THIS EMAIL : (
mrdavidmoyes756@gmail.com
)
As I did say again, the shipper abandoned it and ran away most importantly because he gave a false declaration, he could not pay for the yellow tag, he could not secure a valid non inspection document(s), etc. I am ready to assist you in any way I can for you to get back this packages provided you will also give me something out of it (financial gratification). You can either come in person, or you engage the services of a secure shipping/delivery Company/agent that will provide the necessary security that is required to deliver the package to your doorstep or the destination of your choice. I need all the guarantee that I can get from you before I can get involved in this project.
Please Reply this email strictly at (
mrdavidmoyes756@gmail.com
)
Best Regards,
Mr David Moyes
Head Officer-in-Charge
Administrative Service Inspection Unit
E-mail: 
moyesdavid906@aol.com

subject: Re:   From Mr David Moyes
body:
Hello Mr. David Moyes,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information about the situation. It's quite intriguing to hear about these abandoned metal trunk boxes, especially considering they were declared as personal effects classified documents.

I'm curious, how often do situations like this occur at your facility? And what usually happens if the consignee doesn't claim their shipment?

Also, I'd like to understand better about the process of reconfirming my details. Could you please elaborate on that? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Gina

subject: Re: From Mr David Moyes
body:
Good day thanks for your urgent respond the U.S Treasury Department
has approved the delivery of your consignment box to be done
immediately kindly provide your complete contact address and telephone
number to enable me process the delivery immediately.

I am waiting.

Mr. David Moyes
Head Officer-in-Charge
Administrative Service Inspection Unit
Tel: (+1) 404-313-1461

subject: Re: From Mr David Moyes
body:
Hello Mr. David Moyes,

I hope this message finds you well. It's great to hear that the Treasury Department has approved the delivery of my box. I'm really looking forward to receiving it.

Could you please tell me more about what's inside the box? And also, how long will it take for the box to be delivered?

Thank you so much for your help with this matter. I appreciate it.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Gina

subject: Re: From Mr David Moyes
body:
Reference to your email I need you to understand that i do understand your
Alight as regards your mail, everything about the delivery of your
consignment
box containing US$8Million is 100% real it has nothing to do with scam; the
scanning department scans and confirmed that the amount
inside the consignment box is US$8Million.

I will accompany the delivery person to your address to enable me safe
guild the delivery because of the content of the consignment box.

However, you advice to follow up my advice and also work with me so that
you will receive your consignment boxes successfully and also be
rest assured that you are not going to lose any money you spent on this
consignment.

Again kindly get back to me with the required information and your valid id
cards so that i can forward it to our delivery department to co


I am waiting.

Mr. David Moyes
Head Officer-in-Charge
Administrative Service Inspection Unit
Tel: (+1) 404-313-1461

subject: Re: From Mr David Moyes
body:
Hello Mr. David Moyes,

Thank you for your email and the detailed information about the delivery of the box. It's really exciting to know that such a process exists.

I'm curious, how does the scanning department confirm the amount inside the box? That seems like quite an advanced technology! Also, it's reassuring to know that you will accompany the delivery person for safety reasons. 

You mentioned some required information and valid ID cards, could you please specify what exactly is needed? I just want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Gina

subject: Re: From Mr David Moyes
body:
Thank you very much for your email. Yes I will come along with the delivery
person for safety reasons and we asked for your address for delivery and
your valid ID card for verifications when we get to your home address to
avoid giving it to the wrong person. Ok? So please get back to me with the
full information.

I am waiting.

Mr. David Moyes
Head Officer-in-Charge
Administrative Service Inspection Unit
Tel: (+1) 404-313-1461

subject: Re: From Mr David Moyes
body:
Hello Mr. David Moyes,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation. It's great to know that you take such precautions for safety and to avoid any mix-ups. 

However, I'm a bit concerned about sharing my address and ID card details over email due to privacy reasons. Is there any other way we could arrange this? Maybe I could meet the delivery person at a public place or something? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Gina
